title: Testing
description: Here is guide how to setup testing with {'`@vue/test-utils`'} using Vitest or Jest. To get tests working with VuesticUI you need to install vuestic plugin.

setupFile.title: Setup file
setupFile.description: First, we need to create a file called `setup`. It can be placed anywhere in your project. Here we need to register VuesticPlugin. in {'`@vue/test-utils`'}.

vitest.title: Vitest
vitest.description: Register `setup` file into vitest config. Here is an example of `vitest.config.ts` file:

jest.title: Jest
jest.description: Register `setup` file into jest config. You will need to edit of `package.json` file and `jest` filed:

summary: That's it! Now you can use VuesticUI components in your tests.
